span.span: Provides a base class for all ASP.NET mobile control classes.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作為所有 ASP.NET 行動控制項的基底類別類別主要是包含所有控制項通用的樣式和內容資訊。As the base class for all ASP.NET mobile controls, the class primarily contains style and context information common to all controls. 如需樣式和內容資訊的詳細資訊，請參閱和類別。For more information about style and context information, see the and classes. > [!NOTE] > 因為這個類別衍生自 ASP.NET基底類別，所有基底類別屬性、 方法和事件可用於每個行動控制項。Because this class derives from the ASP.NET base class, all base class properties, methods, and events are available in each of the mobile controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當表單包含巡覽項目可啟動另一個表單，而不需從伺服器互動時，則會視為連結的表單。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interaction from the server, it is considered a linked form. 有數個準則才會被視為表單連結。There are several criteria for a form to be considered linked. 例如，如果符合下列三個條件，表單 B 會被視為連結至表單：For example, if the following three conditions are met, Form B is considered to be linked to Form A: - 包含表單的與表單 B.為其目的地Form A contains a with its destination as Form B. - 表單的不包含事件處理常式。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 表單 B 沒有事件處理常式。Form B has no event handler. 基底實作不做任何動作，但其他控制項，例如，覆寫預設實作。The base implementation does nothing, but other controls, such as the , override the default implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於其他屬性，屬性不繼承自其父代。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果您設定青色父控制項上，子控制項的屬性將不會繼承青色的背景色彩，則您必須明確設定子控制項的屬性到青色、 或者您必須設定屬性控制項的父事件並套用至子控制項的樣式表。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 這是與階層式樣式表的行為一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 未設定這個屬性為`true`上控制項。Do not set this property to `true` on a control. 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`，控制項將會擲回例外狀況。If you set this property to `true`, the control will throw an exception. 這個屬性會忽略尾端分行符號毫無意義的控制項。This property is ignored by controls for which a trailing break does not make sense. 下表列出支援的控制項針對特定種類的裝置的屬性。The following table lists the controls that support the property for certain kinds of devices. 下表顯示支援的裝置類型的控制項屬性。The following table shows the controls with the types of devices that support the property. 請判斷這個屬性的效果，在其裝置上的裝置製造商。Check with device manufacturers to determine the effects of this property on their devices. |控制項Control|使用 HTML 瀏覽器的裝置Device With HTML Browser|WML 瀏覽器的裝置Device With WML Browser|WML/瀏覽器的裝置Device with WML/UP Browser| |-------------|------------------------------|-----------------------------|---------------------------------| |`AdRotator`|||| |`Calendar`|[是]Yes||| |`Command`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`Image`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|[是]Yes| |`Label`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|[是]Yes| |`Link`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`List`|||| |`ObjectList`|是 （除非裝置的瀏覽器可以處理資料表）Yes (unless device's browser can handle tables)||| |`Panel` （預設值為 false）`Panel` (default is false)|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|[是]Yes| |`PhoneCall`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`SelectionList`|是 （除非瀏覽器可以處理資料表）Yes (Unless browser can handle tables)|[是]Yes|| |`TextBox`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`TextView`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`TextViewElement`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|| |`Validator`|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|[是]Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行動控制項，例如，可以覆寫這個方法來判斷是否這是用來以送出表單的控制項。Mobile controls, such as the , can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission. 其他控制項可以透過提供以程式設計方式判斷是否必須是邏輯來擴充`submit`控制項，例如，藉由檢查特定屬性。Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be `submit` controls, for example, by checking for specific properties. > [!NOTE] > Form-submit 控制項，它會實作時，才會被視為控制項方法來擷取回傳事件。A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements method to capture the postback event. 否則，它不會註冊預設事件處理常式，即使該方法會傳回`true`。Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會通知伺服器控制項，它應該執行通用的每個 HTTP 要求的動作，例如設定資料庫查詢相關聯，所以頁面。This method notifies the server control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with, such as setting up a database query. 在這個階段頁面生命週期中，將伺服器控制項階層架構中的會建立並初始化、 還原檢視狀態，和表單控制項反映用戶端資料。At this stage in the page lifecycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized, view state is restored, and form controls reflect client-side data. 使用屬性來判斷是否正在載入的頁面以回應至用戶端回傳，或如果它正在載入並存取第一次。Use the property to determine whether the page is being loaded in response to a client postback, or if it is being loaded and accessed for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫這個方法來儲存私用檢視狀態。You can override this method to store a private view state. 除了與一般的檢視狀態儲存的資訊，ASP.NET mobile Web Form 儲存資訊，例如表單分頁。In addition to information saved with the ordinary view state, ASP.NET mobile Web Forms store information such as whether or not the form is paginated. 這會加入資訊儲存在私用檢視狀態，而且會儲存在用戶端，而不是在伺服器上。This added information is stored in the private view state and is stored on the client rather than the server. 私用檢視狀態會以最佳化方式儲存。A private view state is saved in an optimized manner. 預設行為，例如進行第一種形式的現用表單中，永遠不會包含在儲存的私用檢視狀態。Default behavior, such as making the first form the active form, is never included in the saved private view state.

span.span: An enumerated value that specifies the wrapping mode for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表包含的定義列舉型別。The following table contains the definitions of the enumeration. |列舉Enumerations|值Value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|00|沒有大小是設定為指定的物件。No size is set for the specified object. 這是預設值。This is the default value.| |`Wrap`|11|自動換行至下一行。Wrap to the next line.| |`NoWrap`|22|文字不換行至下一行。The text is not wrapped to the next line.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用藉由設定屬性`FirstForm`屬性根據瀏覽器的功能。The following example demonstrates how to use the property by setting the `FirstForm` property based on the capabilities of the browser. 此程式碼範例是一個較大範例的一部分屬性。This code sample is part of a larger example for the property.
